verses.verse: Listen <S%H8085><s%>, O islands <S%H339><s%>, unto me <S%H7181><s%>; and listen, you people <S%H3816><s%>, from far <S%H7350><s%>; The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> me from the womb <S%H990><s%>; from the bowels <S%H4578><s%> of my mother <S%H517><s%> has he made mention <S%H2142><s%> of my name <S%H8034><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and his Holy One <S%H6918><s%>, to him whom man <S%H5315><s%> despises <S%H960><s%>, to him whom the nation <S%H1471><s%> abhors <S%H8581><s%>, to a servant <S%H5650><s%> of rulers <S%H4910><s%>, Kings <S%H4428><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> and arise <S%H6965><s%>, princes <S%H8269><s%> also shall worship <S%H7812><s%>, because of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that is faithful <S%H539><s%>, and the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he shall choose you <S%H977><s%>.

As I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you shall surely clothe <S%H3847><s%> you with them all <S%H5716><s%>, as with a ornament, and bind <S%H7194><s%> them on you <S%H3618><s%>, as a bride does.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> which you shall have <S%H7923><s%>, after you have lost the other <S%H559><s%>, shall say again in your ears <S%H241><s%>, The place <S%H4725><s%> is too narrow <S%H6862><s%> for me <S%H5066><s%>: give place <S%H4725><s%> to me that I may live <S%H3427><s%>.

Then shall you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, Who has fathered <S%H3205><s%> for me these <S%H7921><s%>, seeing I have lost my sons, and am desolate <S%H1565><s%>, a captive <S%H1540><s%>, and wandering back and forth <S%H5493><s%>? and who has brought up <S%H1431><s%> these <S%H7604><s%>? Behold, I was left alone <S%H375><s%>; these, where had they been?

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, Behold <S%H5375><s%>, I will lift up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to the Nations <S%H1471><s%>, and set up <S%H7311><s%> my standard <S%H5251><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>: and they shall bring <S%H935><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> in their arms <S%H2684><s%>, and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be carried <S%H5375><s%> upon their shoulders <S%H3802><s%>.
